name: Galaxy Shooter (May 2018)
description:
GALAXY SHOOTER

This is the first game I ever made! I followed an online tutorial back in 2018 and created this as well as did most of the C# programming for it. It was a wholly important moment as I learnt how to code states, powerup systems and collision detection among other things. 

Note: Before you start a game, you can use the mouse to select your difficulty (Easy, Normal or Hard). 

Note 2: If you decide to play Co-op mode, press WASD and Space to control Player 1, and D-Pad and Right-Shift to control Player 2.

The music used is So Far To Go by J Dilla, and Sometimes by J Dilla.
